entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9625] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 0 reported in the network role https://www.erstebank.hr/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-320000 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 390,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role https://www.erstebank.hr/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-610000. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : HRK Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -6 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -6 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300A2F46GR0UOM390/2021-12-31/ESEF/HR/0/549300A2F46GR0UOM390-2021-12-31-hr.zip/549300A2F46GR0UOM390-2021-12-31-hr/reports/549300A2F46GR0UOM390-2021-12-31-hr.html 55
